definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: After the meeting, I will you, I very well.
sentences.chinese: 经年相遇，我会对你说，我很好。

sentences.english: Year in and year out, coir raincoat and bamboo hat keep searching by raising their heads and looking far ahead.
sentences.chinese: 江南的蓑衣和竹笠经年地寻找，在远远的翘首远望。

sentences.english: Years of missing and bitter love made me muddleheaded.
sentences.chinese: 经年的思念与苦恋，让我变的混混噩噩。

sentences.english: The mix fluxes over the years.
In the past years, is wandering footsteps, mature is the soul.
sentences.chinese: 经年过往，漂泊的是脚步，成熟的却是心灵。

sentences.english: Brilliant fireworks (or catharine) of many years.
This went through the years, can we still retrieve those lost latter's pieces?
sentences.chinese: 此去经年，我们还能不能找回，那些遗失旳碎片？

sentences.english: The old man next door has been suffering from mental disorder for years.
sentences.chinese: 隔壁邻居的老人经年来饱受精神异常折磨。

sentences.english: Later, it was made know to common folks by old chefs dismissed from the royal Ming Kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 后来经年才被解雇的明朝御膳厨师流传到民间。

sentences.english: to fade away - until I met you.
sentences.chinese: 经年以后，幻想逐渐淡去，直到我遇见了你。

sentences.english: Oh, father of the four winds, fill my sails, across the sea of years.
sentences.chinese: 四方的风神，鼓起我的风帆，穿越经年之海。

sentences.english: Broadcast domestic animation market, after years of weakness, not to mention its derivatives.
sentences.chinese: 国内的动画播映市场，积弱经年，更遑论其衍生产品。

definition: the past/impurity contracted previously (in the sentient world) (Buddhism)
as before/as usual/(to be) like old friends
(literary) to slip/(of looks etc) to fade away/(of time) to slip away/to squander (time, opportunities)/to dillydally
